name: pablo
desc: Hello! My name is Pablo, and I’m a travel consultant passionate about helping visitors experience the best of France. Born and raised in Lyon, the culinary capital of the country, I’ve always been surrounded by rich traditions, vibrant culture, and incredible cuisine. Whether you want to explore the city’s charming traboules, savor authentic dishes in its famous bouchons, or take a day trip to the nearby Beaujolais wine region, I’m here to craft a journey that’s tailored to you. Lyon is a city where history, gastronomy, and beauty come together, and I’d be delighted to help you discover its many wonders.

name: anna
desc: Hello! My name is Anna, and I’m a travel advisor dedicated to sharing the wonders of France. Born and raised in Lyon, often called the culinary heart of the country, I’ve grown up surrounded by exceptional food, rich history, and vibrant culture. Whether you’re curious to wander through the city’s hidden traboules, indulge in traditional dishes at its renowned bouchons, or explore the nearby Beaujolais wine country, I’m here to create a personalized journey just for you. Lyon is a perfect blend of history, gastronomy, and charm, and I’d love to help you experience everything it has to offer.

name: ada
desc: For more than four years, I have turned my work into a passion. I am here to help make your dream trip a reality by sharing my expertise and experiences with you. Looking forward to seeing you soon at our agency!

name: anastasia
desc: Hello! My name is Anastasia, and I’m a travel advisor eager to help you discover the beauty of France. I grew up in Annecy, a stunning alpine town nestled by a crystal-clear lake and surrounded by majestic mountains. Whether you're strolling through the charming old town with its canals, enjoying a boat ride on Lake Annecy, or hiking in the nearby mountains, this idyllic town offers a perfect blend of natural beauty and rich history. Let me help you create a personalized experience to explore the enchanting charm of Annecy and its breathtaking surroundings.

name: elena
desc: Hello! My name is Elena, and I’m a travel advisor eager to share the wonders of France with you. Born and raised in Grenoble, nestled in the heart of the French Alps, I’ve always been surrounded by breathtaking mountain landscapes, rich history, and a vibrant outdoor culture. Whether you want to explore the charming old town, hike in the surrounding alpine peaks, or enjoy skiing in the winter months, Grenoble offers an unforgettable experience for nature lovers and adventure seekers. Let me help you craft a journey that captures the essence of this beautiful region, where the mountains meet culture and adventure.

name: emily
desc: Hello! My name is Emily, and I’m a travel advisor excited to help you explore the beauty of France. I grew up in Rennes, the lively capital of Brittany, known for its stunning medieval architecture, vibrant cultural scene, and rich Celtic heritage. Whether you’re strolling through the charming streets of the old town, visiting the impressive Parlement de Bretagne, or enjoying the local crêpes and cider, Rennes offers a perfect mix of history, tradition, and modern energy. Let me help you plan a personalized journey to experience the magic and warmth of this unique city.

name: erberto
desc: Hello! My name is Erberto, and I’m a travel advisor with a deep love for sharing the beauty of France. Born and raised in Marseille, the vibrant heart of the Mediterranean, I’ve grown up surrounded by sun-drenched landscapes, rich history, and a lively culture. Whether you’d like to stroll along the bustling Vieux-Port, explore the charming streets of Le Panier, or set sail to the stunning Calanques, I’m here to design a trip that’s tailored to your interests. Marseille offers a unique blend of tradition and modernity, and I’d be delighted to help you experience the soul of this remarkable city.

name: ernest
desc: Hello! My name is Ernest, and I’m a travel advisor eager to introduce you to the vibrant charm of France. I grew up in Toulouse, the "Pink City," famous for its stunning red-brick architecture, rich history, and lively atmosphere. Whether you're wandering through the beautiful Capitole Square, exploring the fascinating Cité de l'Espace, or enjoying the delicious local cuisine like cassoulet, Toulouse offers a perfect blend of culture, heritage, and southern warmth. Let me help you create a personalized itinerary to experience the best of this dynamic city and its surroundings.

name: federico
desc: Hello! My name is Federico, and I’m a travel advisor excited to share the charm of France with you. I grew up in Nantes, a dynamic city on the banks of the Loire River, known for its rich maritime history, vibrant arts scene, and beautiful green spaces. Whether you’re exploring the majestic Château des Ducs de Bretagne, wandering through the unique Machines of the Isle of Nantes, or enjoying a boat ride along the river, Nantes offers a perfect blend of culture, history, and creativity. Let me help you plan a personalized trip to experience the magic of this welcoming and lively city.

name: francois
desc: Hello! My name is Francois, and I’m a travel advisor excited to share the wonders of France with you. I was born and raised in Montpellier, a lively and historic city in the south of France, where the Mediterranean climate meets rich culture and beautiful architecture. Whether you're wandering through the charming streets of the old town, enjoying the vibrant atmosphere of Place de la Comédie, or exploring nearby beaches and vineyards, Montpellier offers a perfect mix of history, modernity, and relaxation. Let me help you create a tailored experience to discover the warmth and charm of this remarkable region.

name: gwen
desc: Hello! My name is Gwen, and I’m a travel advisor specializing in uncovering the wonders of France. Born and raised in Provence, I have a deep passion for the cultural, historical, and natural treasures of my country. Whether you dream of exploring the charming hilltop villages of my home region, strolling through the streets of Paris, or savoring fine wines in the vineyards of Burgundy, I’m here to help you craft a tailor-made journey. France, with its stunning diversity of landscapes and vibrant traditions, is an open invitation to escape and be amazed—and I would be delighted to help you experience it in the most authentic way possible.

name: heather
desc: Hello! My name is Heather, and I’m a travel advisor excited to help you explore the wonders of France. I grew up in Bordeaux, a city renowned for its world-class wines, elegant architecture, and vibrant culture. Whether you're strolling along the beautiful Place de la Bourse, enjoying a wine tour through the nearby vineyards, or savoring delicious local cuisine, Bordeaux offers a perfect blend of sophistication and charm. Let me help you plan a personalized journey to discover the rich history, flavors, and beauty of this remarkable city and the surrounding region.

name: hector
desc: Hello! My name is Hector, and I’m a travel advisor excited to share the wonders of France with you. I grew up in Lyon, the gastronomic capital of the country, where history, culture, and incredible food come together in perfect harmony. Whether you’re wandering through the charming Old Town, exploring the vibrant traboules, or enjoying a meal at one of the city’s famous bouchons, Lyon offers a unique blend of tradition and modernity. Let me help you craft a personalized experience to explore the rich heritage, culinary delights, and lively atmosphere of this remarkable city.

name: james
desc: Hello! My name is James, and I’m a travel consultant passionate about showcasing the best of France. Growing up in Lyon, often celebrated as the gastronomic capital of the country, I’ve always been immersed in its rich history, vibrant culture, and exceptional cuisine. From exploring the city’s secret traboules and enjoying traditional bouchon dining to venturing into the picturesque Beaujolais wine region, I can help you plan a unique and memorable experience. Lyon is a city that perfectly blends charm, flavor, and heritage, and I’d be thrilled to guide you in discovering its magic.

name: jamy
desc: Hello! My name is Jamy, and I’m a travel advisor excited to help you experience the best of France. I grew up in Montpellier, a lively city in the south known for its vibrant atmosphere, stunning architecture, and Mediterranean charm. Whether you’re exploring the historic Place de la Comédie, wandering through the narrow streets of the old town, or enjoying the sunny weather in the nearby parks and beaches, Montpellier offers a perfect blend of culture, history, and relaxation. Let me help you craft a personalized itinerary to experience the warmth and beauty of this remarkable city.

name: john
desc: Hello! My name is John, and I’m a travel advisor passionate about helping you discover the treasures of France. I was born and raised in Avignon, a city steeped in history and charm, famous for its stunning Papal Palace and the iconic Pont Saint-Bénézet. Surrounded by the beauty of Provence, with its lavender fields, vineyards, and charming villages, Avignon offers a unique blend of culture, heritage, and natural beauty. Whether you’re interested in exploring medieval streets, enjoying local wines, or taking a scenic drive through the Provence countryside, I’m here to create a personalized experience just for you. Let me help you uncover the magic of Avignon and its surroundings!

name: julie
desc: Hello! My name is Julie, and I’m a travel advisor with a passion for showcasing the unique beauty of France. I grew up in the Loire Valley, a region renowned for its grand châteaux, lush vineyards, and tranquil rivers. Whether you’re eager to explore iconic landmarks like Château de Chambord, indulge in wine tastings at local vineyards, or enjoy a leisurely bike ride along the scenic Loire River, I’ll help you create a bespoke experience. The Loire Valley is one of France’s most captivating treasures, and I would love to guide you in discovering its magic.

name: lisa
desc: Hello! My name is Lisa, and I’m a travel advisor excited to help you discover the beauty of France. I grew up in Nantes, a vibrant city on the banks of the Loire River, known for its rich history, artistic spirit, and dynamic atmosphere. Whether you’re exploring the stunning Château des Ducs de Bretagne, marveling at the imaginative Machines of the Isle of Nantes, or enjoying a stroll through its picturesque parks and along the river, Nantes offers a perfect blend of culture, history, and creativity. Let me help you create a personalized journey to experience the charm and innovation of this incredible city.

name: lock
desc: Hello! My name is Lock, and I’m a travel advisor with a passion for sharing the beauty of France. I grew up in Chamonix, a stunning alpine town nestled at the foot of Mont Blanc, where I’ve always been surrounded by awe-inspiring mountain views and a vibrant outdoor lifestyle. Whether you're eager to ski on world-famous slopes, hike through breathtaking alpine landscapes, or explore the charming streets of Chamonix, this region offers an unforgettable adventure for nature enthusiasts. Let me help you create a personalized journey to experience the perfect blend of adventure, relaxation, and natural beauty that Chamonix has to offer.

name: meredith
desc: Hello! My name is Meredith, and I’m a travel advisor eager to share the charm of France with you. I grew up in Lille, a dynamic and welcoming city known for its rich history, vibrant cultural scene, and warm Flemish influences. Whether you’re exploring the stunning Grand Place, wandering through the charming Old Town, or enjoying the city’s lively cafés and delicious local cuisine, Lille offers a unique blend of French and Belgian cultures. Let me help you create a personalized experience to discover the hidden gems and lively spirit of this remarkable northern city.

name: mickael
desc: Hello! My name is Mickael, and I’m a travel consultant with a deep love for France and its extraordinary regions. I grew up in the Loire Valley, a land of majestic châteaux, rolling vineyards, and enchanting riverscapes. Whether you want to explore the historic castles like Chambord and Chenonceau, savor exquisite wines in family-run cellars, or take a peaceful bike ride along the Loire River, I’m here to design a personalized journey that captures the heart of this beautiful region. France is full of wonders, and the Loire Valley is one of its finest gems—let me help you uncover its charm!

name: miguel
desc: Hello! My name is Miguel, and I’m a travel advisor excited to help you discover the charm of France. I grew up in Carcassonne, a breathtaking medieval city famous for its magnificent fortified castle and winding cobblestone streets. Whether you’re exploring the ancient citadel, enjoying the stunning views from the ramparts, or savoring local wines and cuisine, Carcassonne offers a truly unforgettable experience. Let me help you craft a personalized itinerary to immerse yourself in the rich history and beauty of this UNESCO World Heritage site.

name: sam
desc: Hello! My name is Sam, and I’m a travel advisor thrilled to help you discover the charm of France. I was born and raised in Carcassonne, a breathtaking medieval city that feels like stepping back in time. Famous for its massive fortified walls and towers, Carcassonne offers a unique blend of history, culture, and picturesque beauty. Whether you're exploring the ancient castle, wandering through cobbled streets, or savoring local wines and cuisine, Carcassonne promises an unforgettable experience. Let me help you create a personalized itinerary to immerse yourself in the magic of this incredible UNESCO World Heritage site.

name: vesper
desc: Hello! My name is Vesper, and I’m a travel advisor eager to introduce you to the magic of France. I grew up in Nice, the heart of the French Riviera, where stunning Mediterranean views, vibrant markets, and a rich cultural heritage are part of everyday life. Whether you're strolling along the famous Promenade des Anglais, exploring the colorful Old Town, or relaxing on the beautiful beaches, Nice offers a perfect blend of history, art, and coastal charm. Let me help you craft a personalized journey to experience the elegance and warmth of this incredible city and the surrounding Riviera.
